description.value: You can throw a creature that you are grappling. Attempt an Athletics check against the Fortitude DC of the creature you are grappling. If it is larger than you, increase it's DC by 5 for each step larger. If you succeed, you throw the creature a number of squares away from you equal to your Strength (minimum 1). On a critical success, it is thrown twice this distance. It also takes bludgeoning damage equal to [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6} + the total number of squares thrown. If thrown into another creature, that creature takes the damage as well (basic @Check[type:reflex|dc:15]). The creature thrown lands @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.
